summary: Ran test suite to verify system health. Fixed DatabaseHealthService initialization issue in server.py (uncommented sql_connector parameter). Frontend tests: All 49 tests passed (3 test suites). Backend tests: 142 tests collected, running with some failures in batch_operations and comprehensive test modules. System is mostly healthy with core functionality (auth, architecture, sync) passing. Some test failures appear to be related to mock setup in batch operations tests.
